text.content:
Use the filter dropdowns above to drill down to a single cluster / location / namespace. Some of these charts (e.g. p50 latency) may not show meaningful values when aggregated over multiple model servers.

For more information on setting up TGI in your GKE cluster, see [Serve Gemma open models using GPUs on GKE with Hugging Face TGI](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/tutorials/serve-gemma-gpu-tgi).

widget.title: Model decode token step duration per batch (s)

text.content: The metrics in this section can be filtered by `method = ['prefill', 'decode']` if you want to drill down to the p50 / p95 / p99 latencies of a specific stage for a method.

widget.title: p50 inference duration breakdown by stage (s)
